name: node
description: Creating a simple application node.js web server to push code to GitHub using VS Code.  CI/CD: Use GitHub Actions to build and run the Docker container. Let's create a simple project where you can use VS Code to push code to GitHub and set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline using GitHub Actions. We'll create a basic Node.js application, containerize it using Docker, and set up GitHub Actions to build and run the Docker container.
